title: Nehushta
html: NEHUSHTA(Ne·hushʹta).Daughter of Elnathan of Jerusalem and wife of King Jehoiakim. When the first captives were taken to Babylon in 617 B.C.E. after the three-month rule of her son Jehoiachin, Nehushta was taken along and likely remained there the rest of her life.—2Ki 24:6, 8, 12; Jer 29:2.
